nodes.title: RT @AP: Six Dr. Seuss books — including “And to Think That I Saw It on Mulberry Street” and “If I Ran the Zoo” — will stop being published…
nodes.author: The_Real_Fly

sharedContent.title: Six Dr. Seuss books — including “And to Think That I Saw It on Mulberry Street” and “If I Ran the Zoo” — will stop being published because of racist and insensitive imagery, the business that preserves and protects the author's legacy said. https://t.co/FB2boW7ao0
sharedContent.author: The Associated Press

localize.full_text: RT @AP: 六本苏斯博士的书--包括《我在桑树街看到的》和《如果我开动物园》--将停止出版... ...
localize.retweeted_status_full_text: 六本苏斯博士的书--包括 "想想我在桑树街看到了它 "和 "如果我跑了动物园"--将停止出版，因为种族主义和不敏感的图像，保存和保护作者遗产的业务说。https://t.co/FB2boW7ao0。

localize.full_text: RT @AP: 六本蘇斯博士的書--包括《我在桑樹街看到的》和《如果我開動物園》--將停止出版... ...
localize.retweeted_status_full_text: 六本蘇斯博士的書--包括 "想想我在桑樹街看到了它 "和 "如果我跑了動物園"--將停止出版，因爲種族主義和不敏感的圖像，保存和保護作者遺產的業務說。https://t.co/FB2boW7ao0。

nodes.title: President Biden will announce later Tuesday that Merck & Co. will help make Johnson & Johnson's one-shot COVID-19 vaccine in an unusual agreement between two competitors that could lead to a significant boost in supply, the Washington Post reported. $JNJ https://t.co/avxTv8aJLI https://t.co/2dAorcqFix
nodes.author: MarketWatch

localize.full_text: 据华盛顿邮报报道，总统拜登将在周二晚些时候宣布，默克公司将帮助生产强生公司的一针COVID-19疫苗，这是两个竞争对手之间的一项不同寻常的协议，可能会导致供应量大幅增加。$JNJ https://t.co/avxTv8aJLI https://t.co/2dAorcqFix
據華盛頓郵報報道，總統拜登將在週二晚些時候宣佈，默克公司將幫助生產強生公司的一針COVID-19疫苗，這是兩個競爭對手之間的一項不同尋常的協議，可能會導致供應量大幅增加。$JNJ https://t.co/avxTv8aJLI https://t.co/2dAorcqFix

nodes.title:
I've never seen a book start like this:

"Many business books begin with a tacit promise: 'Let me tell you how to be like me: an unmitigated success!' Clearly, I couldn't say that."

From Hot Seat, by Jeff Immelt https://t.co/7b8D247dM3
nodes.author: Michael Batnick

localize.full_text:
我从未见过一本书有这样的开头。

"许多商业书籍的开头都有一个默契的承诺：'让我来告诉你如何像我一样，获得巨大的成功！' 显然，我不能这么说。"

摘自《热座》，作者：杰夫-伊梅尔特https://t.co/7b8D247dM3

我從未見過一本書有這樣的開頭。

"許多商業書籍的開頭都有一個默契的承諾：'讓我來告訴你如何像我一樣，獲得巨大的成功！' 顯然，我不能這麼說。"

摘自《熱座》，作者：傑夫-伊梅爾特https://t.co/7b8D247dM3

nodes.title:
This summer’s overpriced hotels, flights and Airbnb’s will be brought to you by Johnson & Johnson, Pfizer and Moderna

(I cannot wait to overpay for a vacation)
nodes.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text:
今年夏天的天价酒店、机票和Airbnb将由强生公司（Johnson & Johnson）、辉瑞公司（Pfizer）和摩德纳公司（Moderna）为您带来。

(我迫不及待地想多付点钱去度假)

今年夏天的天價酒店、機票和Airbnb將由強生公司（Johnson & Johnson）、輝瑞公司（Pfizer）和摩德納公司（Moderna）爲您帶來。

(我迫不及待地想多付點錢去度假)

nodes.title:
If you have $1 million you're in the top 1% of ppl worldwide

12% of ppl have $100k or more

And more than half of the world's population has less than $10k to their name

The Best Time to Give Back

https://t.co/SLq0lIAPHO https://t.co/kHS9m7RN5t
nodes.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text:
如果你有100万美金，你就是世界上最有钱的1%的人了

12%的人拥有10万或更多

而世界上有超过一半的人口名下只有不到一万块钱。

回馈社会的最佳时机

https://t.co/SLq0lIAPHO https://t.co/kHS9m7RN5t

如果你有100萬美金，你就是世界上最有錢的1%的人了

12%的人擁有10萬或更多

而世界上有超過一半的人口名下只有不到一萬塊錢。

回饋社會的最佳時機

https://t.co/SLq0lIAPHO https://t.co/kHS9m7RN5t
